result.eng: He hated school and books with a passion.
result.ga: Bhí fuath na námhad aige ar an scoil agus ar na leabhra
result.orig: Bhí fuath na námhad aige ar an scoil agus ar na leabhra

result.eng: I hated him passionately with all my heart.
